St._Clair_Shores.Macomb Sports and Expo Center:
The Macomb Sports and Expo Center is a 2,800-seat indoor arena and convention center located in Warren, Michigan, on the South Campus of Macomb Community College. It is used for the college's athletic programs, trade shows and conventions (The arena features 61,440 square feet (5,708 m2) of floor space) and other special events.
The Sports and Expo Center also features a concessions area, tartan flooring that can withstand 4,000 pounds per square inch, registration and office space, and an adjoining meeting room.
